org.xbmc.android.remote.business

Class AbstractThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.AbstractThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiskCacheThread, DownloadThread, MemCacheThread

    public abstract class AbstractThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Super class for all the cache threads. Keeps common code in one place.
    Author:
    Team XBMC
